title: The Dream of Akinosuke (Premium)
description:

The Dream of Akinosuke
Tonight, Thomas takes us back in time to feudal Japan, where we join Akinosuke on a rainy afternoon. He's soon to learn of a magical connection between butterflies and dreams. ğŸ˜´Â

itunes:title: The Dream of Akinosuke (Premium)
itunes:author: Slumber Studios
itunes:subtitle: Narrated by Thomas Jones. In this classic Japanese folktale, a farmer has a marvelous dream. But was it real, or just in his imagination?
